SGC is an administrative and IT services recruiting company headquartered in Washington, DC.  We have flexible service offerings to help our customers solve their most complex talent acquisition challenges.  We specialize in the following skill areas:Administrative and ProfessionalService Desk and Customer ServiceNetwork Operations Database AdministrationCybersecurity Software Development Our talented network of recruiters has over 30 years of combined experience in delivering various skill sets in a multitude of industries.  In 2017, SGC became a certified Minority Business Enterprise (MBE) by the National Minority Supplier Diversity Council (NMSDC).  We are always looking for quality large business partners to mutually expand business opportunities.Please contact me directly at jsegura@sgcpros.com or visit us at www.sgcpros.com for more information about our company.

Phacil is a leading provider of mission-focused, results-driven technology solutions to the civilian and defense markets. Phacil offers a diverse range of technology services, including Software Development, Systems Integration, Help Desk Services, Operations and Maintenance, Cyber Security, Geographic Information Systems, Technical Consulting, and Business Operations.  The company has received numerous accolades including rankings as a Virginia Fantastic 50 Company, Washington Business Journal’s Top Government Technology Contractors, an Inc. 500/5000 Company and as the Maryland Tech Council’s Government Contracting Firm of the Year.  For more information about the company, please visit phacil.com.

I specialize in technical staffing through Aerotek CE®, a division of Aerotek. I place professionals in many sectors with a focus on:•	Software Engineering•	Electronics•	Manufacturing•	Medical Device•	Aerospace & Defense•	Architecture & Engineering

I had the pleasure of working with JP when I joined Aerotek in 2009. Although JP was managing a different division and was still a budding talent, it didn't take long for me to realize that he had a unique and instinctive ability to lead. Equally important, JP's work ethic, no limits mindset, and business acumen matched his natural talent; this is the characteristic that made JP matchless. It's without surprise that JP became a company top producer and continues to see success. I highly recommend JP for any dynamic Talent Acquisition role.

October 13, 2014, John Paul "JP" was senior to Alex but didn’t manage directly

I had the privilege of working with John during my time at Aerotek. There is a direct tangible and intangible aspect that he brought to our office. In the tangible sense he brings a wealth of knowledge and experience from prior experience business situations and able to provide real world teach backs.There was never a situation where John could not tell you perfect examples of what proved successful and what proved to be a good learning example based on past performance. He has had a battle tested track record of  success and bringing in solid business, training and promoting those around him and developing deep rooted relationships that profit both internal and external entities. From an intangible aspect John was someone who brought a lot of positive energy to our office he light up a room and fire up the troops. Whenever visitors were around he would make sure to extend a warm welcome and make them feel at home.I have certainly gained a great deal of professionalism and teach backs from John he will definitely keep you on your toes and make it worth while to come into work, he can drive results for himself and encourage the same from those he leads and manages. He is results oriented, lively, personable and professional John is definitely an asset to any organization that is lucky enough to have him, I would recommend him in any leadership position.

I worked with JP first as a subordinate and then as a peer. He was an excellent mentor from my first day. JP first seeks to understand your competency with a skill/task before he makes any recommendations. Lastly, when its 'show time' on a sales call JP is someone you would be lucky to have in your corner!

I have had the pleasure of working with JP Segura to fill our temporary staffing needs over the past six years.  JP has a wonderful work ethic and strong follow-through, and has been able to provide us with many great candidates that have turned into permanent hires.  JP takes the time to get to now his clients and their needs, and to connect on a personal level as well as a professional one.  I would highly recommend JP as a recruiter for any organization's technical staffing needs!
